Geocoder

Source: vignettes/components.Rmd
components.Rmd

tmap.mapgl will also features a couple of new map component functions that are only available for the "mapbox" and "maplibre" modes.

One is already implemented: [tm_geocoder()]

Example: metro 

tmap_mode("maplibre")
#> ℹ tmap mode set to "maplibre".

tm_shape(World) +
  tm_borders(lwd = 2) +
tm_shape(metro) +
  tm_dots(size = "pop2030", fill = "gold") +
tm_geocoder()
#> [maplibre mode] map layer `tm_borders` not available for mode "maplibre". This
#> map layer is only available for modes "plot", "view", and "mapbox"
#> [maplibre mode] map layer `tm_dots` not available for mode "maplibre". This map
#> layer is only available for modes "plot" and "view"
